title: Perform Run Cut Analysis
description: A service planner needs to group scheduled bus trips into daily work assignments (runs) for drivers, optimizing for efficiency and adherence to labor rules.

tasks.description: Import the master schedule of all bus trips for a specific day.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required trips are loaded into the planning tool.

tasks.description: Define constraints, such as maximum run time, minimum break time, and other labor agreement rules.
tasks.expected_outcome: All labor constraints are correctly configured.

tasks.description: Run the optimization engine to automatically group trips into efficient runs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a set of proposed runs that covers all trips.

tasks.description: Review the proposed runs, make manual adjustments as needed, and finalize the run cut for drivers to bid on.
tasks.expected_outcome: A final, efficient set of driver work assignments is created.
